p:
For cohort 1, all steps of protein digestion, 6-plex TMT labelling, peptide fractionation and LC-MS analysis on the Dionex Ultimate 3000 UHPLC system coupled with the high-resolution LTQ Orbitrap Velos mass spectrometer (Thermo Scientific), were previously described
12 and are recapitulated in the Supplementary Methods. The sample preparation protocol formed the basis of processing for cohorts 2â€“4 using 10-plex TMT labelling and an Orbitrap Fusion Tribrid Mass Spectrometer (Thermo Scientific) with otherwise only minor alterations as described in the Supplementary Methods.
